hero.name: Eduardo Almeida
hero.role: Full Stack Developer | Turning Ideas into Digital Solutions.
hero.bio: Specializing in creating modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications. With a passion for technology and an eye for detail, I develop everything from intuitive interfaces to robust backend systems, always focused on the best user experience and delivering value.

musicDialog.title: 90s Soundtrack
musicDialog.description: How about enjoying some nostalgic tunes while you browse? Here are some 90s playlist suggestions on YouTube!
musicDialog.openInNewTab: Click a playlist to open it on YouTube in a new tab.

contactDialog.title: Get in Touch
contactDialog.description: Send a message directly to {{recipientEmail}}. I'll respond as soon as possible.
contactDialog.yourMessagePlaceholder: Hello, I'd like to talk about...
contactDialog.successDescription: Thanks for getting in touch. I'll reply soon.
contactDialog.errorDescription: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again.

csDegree.description: Focus on software development, algorithms, data structures, and artificial intelligence. Participated in research projects and developed an academic management system as a final project.
csDegree.highlight1: Final Course Project: Academic Management System with Grade A.

webDevCourse.description: Comprehensive technical training in front-end and back-end web development, interface design, databases, and computer networks.
webDevCourse.highlight1: Development of a local news portal as a practical project.
webDevCourse.highlight2: Award for best project of the 2017 class.

nextjsCert.description: Intensive course focused on best practices for Next.js development, including App Router, Server Components, and performance optimizations.

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
